trigger: Parking orbit apogee < 90 nm or perigee < 80 nm
immediate_effect: CSM state vector unsafe for TLI
recovery_actions: Flight Plan p. 2-18

trigger: TLI checklist incomplete at GET 002:44:00
immediate_effect: TLI burn starts without updated PAD
recovery_actions: Execute MCC-1 earlier; uplink revised PAD

trigger: Δv shortfall > 10 m/s at TLI shutdown
recovery_actions: Plan corrective burn at next communications window

trigger: LM hard dock not confirmed by GET 003:45:00
ongoing_penalty: RCS prop usage +10 lb/hr while redocking
recovery_actions: Recycle docking sequence; verify capture latches

trigger: PTC not established by GET 005:00:00
immediate_effect: Cryo boiloff trending +0.5 lb/hr per tank
recovery_actions: Engage PTC and shed non-critical loads

trigger: PTC roll rate deviates for >30 min
recovery_actions: Re-trim PTC and shed loads

trigger: MCC-1 PAD not verified before burn window
recovery_actions: Request updated PAD at next comm window

trigger: MCC-1 burn not executed by GET 010:10
recovery_actions: Plan MCC-2 with larger budget

trigger: State vector not updated after MCC-1
recovery_actions: Perform P23 and uplink vector

trigger: Consumables check not logged by GET 013:00
recovery_actions: Repeat log and verify LiOH status

trigger: P52 realignment not completed by GET 016:45:00
recovery_actions: Execute P52 realignment and request ground vector

trigger: Program 23 optics update not completed by GET 018:30:00
recovery_actions: Perform P23 sightings and uplink corrections

trigger: MCC-2 PAD not verified before evaluation window
recovery_actions: Request PAD reread and delay evaluation

trigger: MCC-2 go/no-go not recorded by GET 025:30:00
recovery_actions: Conduct evaluation and log decision

trigger: MCC-2 required but not executed or Δv shortfall >1 ft/s
recovery_actions: Plan MCC-3 with additional budget

trigger: MCC-3 PAD not verified before evaluation window
recovery_actions: Request PAD reread and assess MCC-3 need

trigger: MCC-3 go/no-go not recorded by GET 054:30:00
recovery_actions: Log evaluation outcome and inform MCC

trigger: MCC-3 required but not executed or Δv shortfall >0.5 ft/s
recovery_actions: Plan MCC-4 with enlarged budget

trigger: LOI-focused P52 realignment not completed by GET 067:00:00
ongoing_penalty: Platform error grows 0.3°/hr heading into LOI
recovery_actions: Execute P52 and request ground vector

trigger: MCC-4 PAD not verified before LOI-5 h window
recovery_actions: Obtain PAD reread and adjust LOI plan

trigger: MCC-4 required but not executed or Δv shortfall >0.3 ft/s
recovery_actions: Adjust LOI targeting and plan additional trim

trigger: LOI-1 PAD not loaded before GET 073:00:00
recovery_actions: Reload PAD and confirm Program 41 entries

trigger: SPS/LM configuration incomplete by GET 074:30:00
ongoing_penalty: LOI start delayed; cryo usage +0.2 lb/hr
recovery_actions: Complete configuration checklist and verify talkbacks

trigger: LOI-1 Δv shortfall >15 ft/s or burn aborted
recovery_actions: Plan emergency correction or abort to free-return

trigger: LOI-1 evaluation not completed by GET 076:40:00
recovery_actions: Update state vector with MCC assistance

trigger: LOI-2 PAD not verified before burn window
recovery_actions: Obtain PAD reread and adjust timeline

trigger: LOI-2 not executed or Δv shortfall >0.5 ft/s
recovery_actions: Schedule trim burn and replan LM timeline

trigger: LOI-2 evaluation not logged by GET 081:00:00
recovery_actions: Complete evaluation and transmit results
